ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Those are both lvl 16 spells. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: Spehar, David J  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Those are both lvl 16 spells.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
